rows.title: Require active BP to have the most updated eosio software being used
rows.proposal_json: {"content":"Require active BP to have the most updated eosio software being used","type":"referendum-v1"}

rows.title: Stop Processing Sportbet Tx
rows.proposal_json:
{"content":"After some deliberation i decided to take pro active measures to bring more justice and accountability into EOS blockchain.

Im using https://sportbet.one to place some bets using the EOS Token

On December 18 of 2019 i placed 2 bets in the match Kamza Basket vs Apollonia - Albania Basketball with the event starting at 16H GMT. The bet was Apollonia +37.5 points and the final result was Kamza Basket 83 Apollonia 74. So i won that bet.

The result can be verified at the League Official Site https://www.fshb.al/fshb/kategoria-i/

But for my surprise, after more than 2days the game was cancelled by the leader of Sbet without any explanation. After my questions at Sportbet TG, he decided to give his own view of the situation and what the rules of sportbet say about my bet:

his answer was since he didnt had the result, he decided to cancel the bet.

This is ilegal, fraud to the users and put at risk the BPs processing tx of a project this is stealing from their clients

Under this principle i ask the Top21 BPs to stop processing sportbet tx until they have a license to operate and have a Regulator that can protect clients in situations like mine. 

If a projects want to use EOSio tech it should be legit, to many scams are using this blockchain to stole funds and for me this needs to end.","type":"referendum-v1"}

rows.title: Increase number of BP
rows.proposal_json: {"content":"Increase number of active BPs from 21 to 43.","type":"referendum-v1"}

rows.title: 交易所必须要特殊eos账号取消投票权.并给予更多的安全保护,可以解决投票权力混乱与偷盗问题.
rows.proposal_json: {"content":"The exchange must have a special eos account to cancel the voting rights, and give more security protection, can solve the problem of voting power chaos and theft.","type":"投票权 Voting rights"}

rows.title: Should Worker Proposal System be adopted?
rows.proposal_json:
{"type":"bps-proposal-v1","question":" Should Worker Proposal System be adopted? ","content":" Worker Proposal System or WPS for short is a proposition originating from the EOSIO whitepaper. Token holders can elect a number of Worker Proposals designed to benefit the community. The winning proposals will receive tokens of up to a configured percent of the token inflation (0-4%).

These proposals will receive tokens proportional to the votes each application has received from token holders, up to the amount requested for performing the work. The elected proposals can be replaced by newly elected proposals by token holders.

Additional Resources

1. [EOS Commons Development Fund Program](https://medium.com/wps-working-group-eos/eos-commons-development-fund-program-78174b76cc44)
2. [The EOS Worker Proposal System, Necessary, Or Useless?](https://medium.com/wps-working-group-eos/the-eos-worker-proposal-system-necessary-or-useless-bebacc56b2ca)
3. [Referendum vote on WPS](https://eostitan.com/proposals?proposal=wps&created_at=2019-01-12T15%3A47%3A52.000Z&tab=0) "}

rows.title: Should EOS replace the Worker Proposal Fund with Universal Resource Inheritance?
rows.proposal_json:
{"type":"bps-proposal-v1","question":" Should EOS replace the Worker Proposal Fund with Universal Resource Inheritance? ","content":" Universal Resource Inheritance (URI) is a hypothetical proposal that plans to distribute the remaining 4% of inflation to unique users.

The technology is not defined yet (moonshot), but is expected to come in a future version of the Block.one wallet. It is often referred to counter Worker Proposal Fund (WPS) since it offers a counterbalance to token weighted voting and distributes inflation to each valid ID. Some people want URI and WPS to coexist.

Additional Resources

1. [Universal Resource Inheritance](https://medium.com/@bytemaster/universal-resource-inheritance-505e7ca4d048)
2. [Will crypto-UBIs change the world?](https://cryptoinsider.21mil.com/will-crypto-ubis-change-world/) "}

rows.title: Do you support base layer arbitration?
rows.proposal_json:
{"type":"bps-proposal-v1","question":" Do you support base layer arbitration? ","content":" Article IX in the EOS constitution, titled Dispute Resolution, appoints the human-run EOS Core Arbitration Forum (ECAF) as a form of base layer arbitration. The constitution empowers the ECAF to issue directives on any dispute between Block Producers (BPs), DApps, or claims against user accounts. Orders are then sent to BPs for execution.

Additional Resources

1. [The EOSIO Core Arbitration Forum](https://eoscorearbitration.io/)
2. [Against Mandatory Arbitration on EOS](https://medium.com/aurora-eos/against-mandatory-arbitration-on-eos-32334ba3af9f)
3. [The State of EOS Governance: ECAF and {{regarbitrator}}](https://medium.com/eos-new-york/the-state-of-eos-governance-ecaf-regarbiter-401c073d622d)
4. [Referendum vote on curent base layer arbitration- ECAF](https://eostitan.com/proposals?proposal=wps&created_at=2019-01-12T15%3A47%3A52.000Z&tab=0) "}

rows.title: Should EOS adopt a new constitution more aligned with Block.one’s proposed v2.0?
rows.proposal_json:
{"type":"bps-proposal-v1","question":" Should EOS adopt a new constitution more aligned with Block.one’s proposed v2.0? ","content":" Block.one’s proposed constitution opposes the interim (v1.0) constitution; it's a clash of two different philosophies. “Intent of the code is law” is represented by Block.one’s proposed v2.0 versus the philosophy of “code is not law, law is law” employed by v1.0. Both are partly subjective, but greatly differ in the scope where this subjectivity can be applied.

Additional Resources

1. [Block.one’s Proposal for EOS Constitution v2.0](https://block.one/news/block-ones-proposal-for-eos-constitution-v2-0/)
2. [The “Intent of Code” is Law](https://medium.com/@bytemaster/the-intent-of-code-is-law-c0e0cd318032) "}

rows.title: Are you in favour of changing voting weight to 1 token 1 vote?
rows.proposal_json:
{"type":"bps-proposal-v1","question":" Are you in favour of changing voting weight to 1 token 1 vote? ","content":" Currently, each token represents 30 votes. The intended outcome is to increase decentralisation. However, many would argue that this structure led to a formation of reciprocity voter schemes.
Some see this as locked-in cartels, other say it incentivises cooperation from different BPs to produce system tools together.

Additional Resources

1. [Referendum vote on 1 Token 1 Vote](https://eostitan.com/proposals?proposal=1token1vote&created_at=2019-01-11T16%3A30%3A02.000Z&tab=0) "}
